definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Chosun Ilbo, a South Korean newspaper

sentences.english: Employee Union Management System for Shanghai Jiefang Daily Newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 上海解放日報工會管理系統。

sentences.english: We now bring you the full text of the Renmin Ribao editorial.
sentences.chinese: 現在全文廣播《人民日報》社論。

sentences.english: And according to the Daily Princetonian, you're familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 根據普林斯頓日報，你應該很熟悉了。

sentences.english: This information comes from "Farmer's Daily", for reference only.
sentences.chinese: 本信息來自《農民日報》，僅供參考。

sentences.english: The Wall Street Journal gives a daily report of the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 《華爾街日報》每天報告股市行情。

sentences.english: If you do not want to receive our promotion material, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 假如閣下不希望再收到星島日報優惠電郵，請按此處。

sentences.english: Yule sat behind a desk, reading The Wall Street Journal.
sentences.chinese: 於爾先生坐在辦公桌後面看《華爾街日報》。

sentences.english: A commentator in the China Daily said export curbs would encourage smuggling.
sentences.chinese: 《中國日報》評論員認爲抑制出口會鼓勵走私。

sentences.english: Chosun Ilbo is also wrong when I should be the other way around and Jiang, right?
sentences.chinese: 朝鮮日報也有錯的時候，把我和江倒過來纔對吧？

sentences.english: I have a China Daily and One Beijing Youth, please?
sentences.chinese: 給我來一份中國日報和北京青年好麼？。

sentences.english: Last year, ‘China Daily’ launched a U.S. edition.
sentences.chinese: 去年，《中國日報》發行了其在北美銷售的版本。

sentences.english: Reading the People's Daily keeps us abreast of current events.
sentences.chinese: 閱讀《人民日報》可以使我們及時瞭解當今天下大事。

sentences.english: I ate breakfast, read the paper, and took a nap.
sentences.chinese: 我吃了早飯，閱讀了世界日報，然後睡覺了。

sentences.english: He is the vice art director of Xuzhou daily.
sentences.chinese: 原江蘇省徐州日報社美術編輯副主任。

sentences.english: I write op-eds for GT's English edition (and China Daily).
sentences.chinese: 我給《環球時報》的英文版以及中國日報的專欄寫稿。

sentences.english: "Nothing is certain right now, " Liu said to the China Daily.
sentences.chinese: “沒有什麼是一定的，現在，”劉說，以中國日報。

definition: evening newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Evening News
Global Times (weekly digest of international news from People's Daily 人民日報|人民日报[Ren2 min2 Ri4 bao4])
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
